# Loading packages

```{r}

```

# Importing NYC Transit dataset:

```{r}
transit_data = read_csv(file = "./data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv")
```

Clean Names:

```{r}
transit_data = janitor::clean_names(transit_data) %>% select(line:entry, vending, ada)
```
